Ini Pilihan Ponsel Murah Berfitur NFC
02 Nov 2019, 17:51 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: Androidpit

Jakarta - Butuh ponsel berfitur NFC tapi budget terbatss? Tenang ada sejumlah ponsel yang memiliki fitur tersebut tapi dibanderol ramah kantong.Kendati sejumlah vendor yang menilai fitur NFC belum begitu layak dihadirkan di ponselnya. Tapi sejatinya fitur NFC cukup dibutuhkan, terutama mereka para komuter.Dengan fitur NFC, mereka bisa mengecek saldo kartu uang elektronik lewat ponsel. Bahkan beberapa layanan menyediakan opsi untuk bisa top-up langsung.Beberapa tahun teknologi NFC memang hanya tersedia di jajaran ponsel flagship. Tapi belakangan para vendor mulai menyertakan fitur ini ke ponsel murahnya. Nah berikut ini empat ponsel berfitur NFC dibanderol terjangkau yang bisa detikers pilih:1. Galaxy A30sGalaxy A30s hadir dalam bentangan 6,4 inch dengan resolusi HD+. Menggunakan panel Super AMOLED dengan notch Infinity F.Dapur pacunya Exynos 7904 dengan fabrikasi 14 nm yang dipadukan dengan RAM 4 GB. Untuk menghadirkan pengalaman gaming yang lancar, Samsung menyertakan fitur AI Game Booster.


Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET

Memori internalnya berkapasitas 64 GB yang dilengkapi dengan slot microSD yang mendukung hingga 512 GB. Sementara baterainya 4.000 mAh dengan pengisian 15W.Ponsel ini punya tiga kamera belakang. Konfigurasinya 25MP f/1.7, ultra wide 8 MP dan depth sensor 5MP. Untuk selfie masih terpasang kamera 16 MP f/2.0.A30s dibekali Dolby Atmos dan USB Type C. Ada tiga pilihan warna, yakni Prism Crush Black, Prism Crush White dan Prism Crush Green. Soal harganya ponsel ini dilepas seharga Rp 3,299 juta.

This is Cheap NFC Feature Phones
02 Nov 2019, 17:51 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: Androidpit

Jakarta - Need an NFC-enabled mobile phone but the budget is limited? Relax there are a number of mobile phones that have these features but are priced pocket friendly. Despite a number of vendors who judge the NFC feature is not so feasible presented on the cell phone. But the NFC feature is really needed, especially those commuting. With the NFC feature, they can check electronic money card balances via cellphone. Some services even provide options for direct top-up. Several years of NFC technology is only available in the ranks of flagship phones. But lately vendors have begun to include this feature in cheap phones. So here are four NFC-enabled phones with affordable prices that you can choose from: 1. Galaxy A30s Galaxy A30s come in a 6.4 inch stretch with HD + resolution. Uses Super AMOLED panel with Infinity F. The kitchen is exynos 7904 with 14 nm fabrication combined with 4 GB RAM. To deliver a smooth gaming experience, Samsung includes AI Game Booster features.


Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikINET

Its internal memory capacity of 64 GB is equipped with a microSD slot that supports up to 512 GB. While the battery is 4,000 mAh with 15W charging. This cellphone has three rear cameras. The configuration is 25MP f / 1.7, 8 MP ultra wide and 5MP depth sensor. For selfies, there is still a 16 MP f / 2.0.A30s camera equipped with Dolby Atmos and USB Type C. There are three color choices, namely Prism Crush Black, Prism Crush White and Prism Crush Green. About the price of this mobile phone released for Rp 3,299 million.
